events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit at all and I want to return it.
The case was categorized under Refund based on keywords indicating the customer wants to return the product and get their money back.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle this refund request and will reach out shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm Maria and I'll assist you with your refund request for the jacket that does not fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for us to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is completely new, with tags still attached and in its original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your refund request. Please send the jacket back to our returns address, and once received, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the clear instructions. I will send the jacket back tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow a few days for it to appear in your account.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything was handled very smoothly. Thank you for your help!
We are closing this case as resolved. Thank you for contacting us and please do not hesitate to reach out in the future.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on the refund process and overall support experience.
